Legal_Issue: Reasonableness of Board's rejection based on gender and returnee status
Governing_Law: Convention relating to the Status of Refugees
Evidence_Assessment: Credibility issues regarding past persecution; lack of analysis on profile-based claim
Decision_Outcome: Rejection of refugee claim by the Board
Burden_of_Proof: On applicant to establish risk of persecution
Credibility_Factor: Credibility concerns raised about Ms. Bastien's account of past persecution
Legal_Rule: Refugee Protection Division must assess claims based on objective evidence and consider particular social groups
Procedural_Issue: Failure to adequately analyze profile-based claim (gender and returnee status)
Grounds_for_Claim: Persecution based on gender and nationality as a returning Haitian citizen
Outcome_on_Merits: Claim rejected due to credibility, but error found in profile analysis
Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: Inadequate consideration of profile-based claim raises fairness concerns
Key_Evidence_Considered: Applicant's testimony, country conditions in Haiti, gender-based risks
Legal_Framework: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act (IRPA), International Refugee Law
Applicant_Challenge: Board failed to properly assess her membership in a particular social group
Court_Result: Remitted for re-determination by a different panel
Legal_Rule_Source: Convention relating to the Status of Refugees, IRPA
Defendant_Response: Board maintained rejection based on credibility findings
Evidence_Type: Testimonial evidence, documentary evidence on country conditions
Remedy_Sought: Quashing of Board's decision and re-determination
Resolution_Mechanism: Judicial review followed by re-hearing before Refugee Protection Division
Legal_Provision: Section 97(1) IRPA, Article 1A(2) of the Refugee Convention
Authority: Immigration and Refugee Board, Federal Court
Claimant_Status: Haitian woman, returning national, alleged member of particular social group
Legal_Provision_Cited: IRPA s. 96, s. 97(1); Refugee Convention Article 1A(2)
Grounds_for_Inadmissibility_or_Allegatio: Risk of persecution due to gender and returnee status
Governing_Rule: Refugee Protection Division Rules regarding assessment of social group claims
